title: VOTE: Premier League's worst miss
description: After Raheem Sterling's miss-of-the season contender in Manchester City's 1-1 draw at Burnley, we take a look at the worst misses in Premier League history...
content: We have delved into the archives and picked out some of the worst misses in front of goal since the beginning of the Premier League in 1992.Some of the best goalscorers in Premier League history also make the cut with Sky Sports' very own Thierry Henry, the Premier League's record goalscorer Alan Shearer, Robbie Fowler and Cristiano Ronaldo on the list.So what is the worst miss in Premier League history is? It time to have YOUR say...Hit play on the video above to watch before voting for in our poll below.
